title: Doing it God's Way
itunes:author: Guests: Jeff & Cheryl Scruggs
itunes:summary:
If your vehicle had a problem, sometimes, looking in the owner's manual can help you fix it. In the same way, when your marriage faces a challenge, going to Scripture can point you to a solution. John and Greg share some practical ways to focus your relationship on Christ. Featuring Jeff and Cheryl Scruggs.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "I Do Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-08?refcd=1411201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/doing-it-gods-way/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/hope-for-every-marriage-digital-product/?refcd=1411201

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
